Title: mapExtractKeyLike
Description: Give a map with string keys and a LIKE pattern, this function returns a map with elements where the key matches the pattern.
map — Map. Map.pattern  - String pattern to match.
A map containing elements the key matching the specified pattern. If no elements match the pattern, an empty map is returned.
Examples: CREATE TABLE tab (a Map(String, String)) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO tab VALUES ({'abc':'abc','def':'def'}), ({'hij':'hij','klm':'klm'});SELECT mapExtractKeyLike(a, 'a%') FROM tab;
